channel.title: [PI] Ganodermic Model Issue

item.title: [PI] Ganodermic Model Issue
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

Changing:

itemdef.anInt165;
itemdef.anInt200;

To the right numbers. If I’m honest, the ModelID usually has the lower number, so you should swap 10919 with 10490, see if that works.

ModelID would be 10490,
Those two things I told you to change would be 10919.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Ganodermic Model Issue
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:490355”][quote author=Sup22211 link=topic=608588.msg4231338#msg4231338 date=1361298526]
Oh cool send me the models ill make a object called Tree and ill make an option to wear it lolol.
maybe the
itemdef.anInt165;
itemdef.anInt200;
not good.
edit : if(i == 921) maybe the id 921 is already taken for something else.
[/quote]
Hardcoding it would overwrite the item that has the id of 921. Your equip models must be wrong.[/quote]
So yes as i said
itemdef.anInt165;
itemdef.anInt200;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Ganodermic Model Issue
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Ok, so I added the Ganodermic set to my PI server, and for some reason the pieces turn me into misc objects such as a tree… What am I doing wrong? (This is my first attempt with models)

Here are my Ints if it matters, and I got the models off of rune-server.

} if(i == 920) { itemdef.modelID = 10919; itemdef.name = "Ganodermic Poncho"; itemdef.description = "It's a Ganodermic Poncho"; itemdef.stackable = false; itemdef.modelZoom = 1513; itemdef.modelRotation1 = 384; itemdef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemdef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemdef.modelOffset2 = 3; itemdef.anInt165 = 10490; itemdef.anInt200 = 10490; itemdef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemdef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemdef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemdef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemdef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; } if(i == 922) { itemdef.modelID = 10935; itemdef.name = "Ganodermic Visor"; itemdef.description = "It's a Ganodermic Visor"; itemdef.stackable = false; itemdef.modelZoom = 789; itemdef.modelRotation1 = 67; itemdef.modelRotation2 = 175; itemdef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemdef.modelOffset2 = -5; itemdef.anInt165 = 10523; itemdef.anInt200 = 10523; itemdef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemdef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemdef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemdef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemdef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; } if(i == 921) { itemdef.modelID = 10942; itemdef.name = "Ganodermic Leggings"; itemdef.description = "It's Some Ganodermic Leggings"; itemdef.stackable = false; itemdef.modelZoom = 1740; itemdef.modelRotation1 = 474; itemdef.modelRotation2 = 2045; itemdef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemdef.modelOffset2 = -5; itemdef.anInt165 = 10486; itemdef.anInt200 = 10486; itemdef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemdef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemdef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemdef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemdef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";

Read full topic
